original_text: And Eleazar son of Aaron died and was buried at Gibeah, which had been allotted to his son Phinehas in the hill country of Ephraim.
korean_text: 아론의 아들 엘르아살도 죽으매 그들이 그를 그의 아들 비느하스가 에브라임 산지에서 받은 산에 장사하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Eleazar son of Aaron died
which had been allotted to his son Phinehas
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그의 아들 비느하스에게 분배된 곳이었고

sentences.original_text: in the hill country of Ephraim
